post.body: Yeah, all that shake-down action and no style make-over!! Gov. Badhairovich needs new priorities!!
Bsides Feb is only PERFECT mnth of 4 weeks! Perfect month 2 celebrate African American History. 1 of thse wks should be kwansa
What kind of dumb ass parents let a stranger inspect their young children's underwear in a separate room?
I will never watch a Senate debate on CSPAN ever again if I will have to hear to Fran Drescher's voice!! Super IRRITATING Nanny!
don't u have to change water:anti-freeze ratio for cold weather? Gotta brush up, moving back to Ohio from SoCal next week!
I think if I even visit Jamaica I'd never leave
saw your website and I'm convinced our paths crossed in Atl. Where did you have your kids? Might have been your nurse!
Thanks 4 following, and that video is a classic!!
I agree. 4 us they are impotent! Just a relic from the past. Always been 2 politically correct to make real difference.
some of us didn't accept Christ bcuz of "forced assimilation" and sing Hallelujah Chorus happily!!
is NAACP still relevant?
@CedricMcCay how do i do that?
I remember Karenga in tlk circuit back in 66 sellng kwanza as a reaction to Watts riots 2 protest forced assimilation.
Feb isn't sacred, just mnth set aside to honor, discover, cherish African AAmerican people so why not then?
I know some people on night shift that probably wish her condition were contageous!
Thnks! Don't know the 1st thing about getting started but I want out of hospital nursing really bad! Would LOVE 2 b nsg lobbyist
I need to start one I guess. I'm new to blogging. I'm a reforming letter to the editor type.
(blushing)
Just like Gov Badhairovich, NO SYMPATHY. Seeing Karma play itself out is so satisfying! Seems like he askd 4/deserved it!
watched the whole tape on CSPAN, it was a hooker and HE wantd sex but she knew it was a sting. I've got NO SYMPATHY 4 him though
Contrats dude!
the entire Bob Giraldi, Charli Brown Christams is a great, David Benoit has a great jazzy CD too
yeah but that crap isn't funny. It's infuriating!
It's Badhairovich, get it right girl!
2 of my favrite Christms tunes: Evlis Presley, Blue Christmas, Eartha Kitt: Santa Baby. 2bad back then songs only 2 minuts
Yeah, yeah, yeah but was Ken Calvert smoking crack with little ms lapface?
No/don't remembr, do remembr Jerry Springer was Cincinnati Mayor in 70s, went 2 hooker, pd w/personl chck, resigned in disgrace
We all know/suspct they all do wht Badhair did, "pay-to-play" & shake dwns,BUT SMOKIN CRACK W/A HOOKER?? Marion Berry still reigns
In Atlanta outgoing crook/sherrif had replacemt sherrif KILLED!! Former Police chf Eldrin Bell was former drunken lounge singer.
Moved here from Atlanta as crook/mayor Bill Campbell was on his was 2 trail, he just got out of jail!
Not well versed on CA state politics. Moved here when Grey Davis was on his way out. I know the schools SUCK!!!
hoping Badhairovich starts a sweepng "throw the bums out" trend. STILL blieve some are truly honest w/passion for public service.
how can they build roads when fat cat crooks need to be paid?
Yeah but didn't it cost twice as much as predicted?
All that money swirling around and stuff is still crumbling. "Pet" projects come before necessities.
Maybe Ahhnold is playing games w/ the $$$? No, really, GOP or not, he SEEMS like a honest guy.
yeah and how do you go THAT far over budget?
going west, just past the I-10 by the big RV place
see what I mean about Gitmo, the US "justice" system commits far worse atrocities on its own peopl as part ofthe "American Way"
I'm so sure they're gonna blow the Fed's case because Wolf Blitzer throws a hissy
not if they are cooperaing with Fed investigatrs, the public has a right to know AT THE TIME that it's our best interest
guilty to what?
"Give me your tired, your poor..." yeah, so we can exploit them and treat them like sh*t! It's the American Way!
How can we start deporting all of our brazen child molesters to Iran? Can that be worked out please?
SO TRUE, and at this age, they're tag-teaming me, Mom is 82, son is 12!!
Also, Everything but you, from Temptations Christmas (album) Carmen McCrea's version of The Christmas song-classics!
duuuh, I thought it was a blog!!! LOL
don't know a thing about blago
2day's my son's 12th he's having a party w/a few friends spending the night
NO, YOU wil probably kill your co-workers!!
Just drove past crumbling freewy ovrpass on 91 in Rivrside, CA. Hope the bail out includes roads projects. BIG CHUNKS, SCARY STUFF!!!!
Badhairovich, a Democrat, can do his part 4 bipartisonship by sharing jail cell w/the former Illinois Gov, a Republican
